                                   Flight flight2)
        lateralDistanceBetweenFlights: Calculates the lateral distance between two flights.
        Parameters:
        flight1 - - A flight from the airspace.
        flight2 - - A flight from the airspace.
        Returns:
        A double representing the lateral distance between the two flights passed as parameters.

      • checkViolation

        public void checkViolation(Airspace airspace)
        checkViolation: Calculates whether two flights have breached the game over separation rules.
        Parameters:
        airspace - - The airspace object is passed as the checkViolation() method requires knowledge of flights in the airspace, which is stored within the airspace.

      • render

        public void render(org.newdawn.slick.Graphics g,
          org.newdawn.slick.GameContainer gc,
          Airspace airspace)
        render: This calculates whether any flights in the airspace are breaking warning separation rules If two flight are breaking warning separation rules, a line is drawn between them.
        Parameters:
        g - - Graphics libraries required by slick2d.
        gc - - GameContainer required by slick2d.
        airspace - - The airspace object is passed as the render method requires knowledge of flights in the airspace, which is stored within the airspace.

      • update

        public void update(Airspace airspace)
        update: This calls the checkViolation method to detect whether the game over separation rules have been breached.
        Parameters:
        airspace - - The airspace object is passed as the checkViolation method requires knowledge of flights in the airspace, which is stored within the airspace.
